title: Esther Becomes Queen
summary: Esther, a Jewish orphan raised by her cousin Mordecai, is chosen to be part of the king's beauty search. She wins favor and becomes queen. Mordecai also uncovers a plot against the king and reports it.

faq.question: Who was Esther?
faq.answer: A Jewish woman raised by Mordecai who became queen of Persia.

faq.question: What did Mordecai do at the end of this chapter?
faq.answer: He uncovered a plot to assassinate the king and saved his life.
